extDescription.message: Convert spreadsheet cells to Markdown table format

popupDescription.message: Automatically converts selected cells in your spreadsheet to Markdown format.

copyNoHeaderButton.description: Button text for copying without header

copyNoSheetNameButton.description: Button text for copying without sheet name

alwaysNoHeader.description: Label for always exclude header checkbox

alwaysNoSheetName.description: Label for always exclude sheet name checkbox

errorNoClipboard.message: No data in clipboard. Please select cells in your spreadsheet.
errorNoClipboard.description: Error message when clipboard is empty

errorNoTable.description: Error message when no table data is found

successConverted.message: Converted to Markdown table! Copied to clipboard.

errorNoOriginalData.description: Error message when original data is missing

successNoHeaderCopy.message: Copied to clipboard without header row.

successNoSheetNameCopy.message: Copied to clipboard without sheet name.

sheetNameNotFound.description: Error message when sheet name cannot be retrieved
